articles.title: Texas Will Not Reverse $16 Billion Power Overcharges During Freeze - OilPrice.com
articles.description: The Public Utility Commission of Texas has rejected a proposal to retroactively reverse the market pricing for electricity that resulted in ERCOT overcharging the Texas electricity market by US$16 billion during the Texas Freeze in February

articles.title: Coroner: Person found submerged in ditch was 15-year-old boy - WANE
articles.description: Just before 11 a.m., police responded to Meyer Road just north of East Paulding Road on a report of a body found. There, officials found the body in a ditch off the roadway.
articles.content:
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (WANE) — The person found partially submerged in a ditch just southeast of Fort Wayne late Monday morning was a 15-year-old boy who’d been missing since Friday.
